Articles.Content: hello, I'm having some issues in free iva whenever the kerbal leaves the seat. Certain modules from Stock-a-like station expansion and Habtech 2will have black walls and I can't open any hatches. Do you have a solution to this problem?

Do you have the newest HabTech and Habtech props? Without Habtech probs you don`t have IVA.
I think it is better to ask in the FreeIVA-Thread.
